sqlMap.sql: stock_daily_id, stock_code, trading_date, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price, gmt_create, gmt_modified, trading_volume, trading_amount, stock_name, warrant_factor
sqlMap.select:
select
from stock_daily_data where trading_date >= #startDate# and trading_date <= #endDate# and stock_code = #stockCode# order by trading_date asc;
sqlMap.update: update stock_daily_data set stock_code=#stockCode#, trading_date=#currentDate#, opening_price=#openingPrice#, closing_price=#closingPrice#, highest_price=#highestPrice#, lowest_price=#lowestPrice#, gmt_modified=now(), trading_volume=#tradingVolume#, trading_amount=#tradingAmount#, stock_name=#stockName#, warrant_factor=#warrantFactor# where stock_daily_id = #stockDailyId#;
